text: Saltoro Kangri is a mountain in the Karakoram range, in the disputed Jammu and Kashmir region. It is also known as Saltoro Range. The name means Yellow Mountain. It is the 31st highest mountain in the world. The first people to reach the top were R.A. Bashir, A. Saito, and Y. Takamura, in 1962. ==References== Category:Karakoram Category:Jammu and Kashmir Category:Mountains of India
title: Saltoro Kangri
